name: Portfolio site
overview: Personal portfolio site built to house projects and demonstrate my accumulated front-end skills.

name: Car sharing app
overview: For the capstone project at RMIT, my team set out to create a full stack web app for a car sharing service. My roles include UI design, front-end development( includes state management, working with Google Maps API and fetching data from backend API), SCRUM meeting and project documentations.

name: IOS Timer app
overview: A university project, IOS timer app which provides data storage, accelerometer analytics and weather information. My responsibilities includes Scrum master, team lead, UI designer and mobile developer.
features: Use of accelerometer data to provide analytics
Provide weather information based on location

name: Timer app
overview: I got an idea to build something that can force me off the computer when I found myself spend too much time on it. I first created a Python script followed by learning Electron JS and build a simple Mac OS and Windows timer apps with the function to automatically disrupt the computer from working. All accomplished in the span of 2 weeks.
